data.title: Urban Edge Church
data.text:

Browse by selecting one of the categories below.

STRUGGLING TO FIND A GROUP?

We would love to help you find a group that is the right fit for you!

Please complete the form below and someone on our team will get in touch with you.

Name and Surname

Email Address

Contact Number

In which suburb do you live?

Which Campus do you primarily attend?

Are you looking for an in-person or online group?

Are you looking for a child-friendly group?

Briefly describe your age and stage of life

Are there particular days or times that work best for you?

Please leave this field empty.
